rule: If the specified word does not correspond to any of the predefined part-of-speech tags listed, the chatbot may return a tag other than "Unknown".
complianceText:
The chatbot output "Invalid input." does not comply with the description. The task requires the chatbot to return one of the specified part-of-speech tags, "Unknown", or "CantAnswer". Since "Invalid input." is not any of these, the output doesn't match the required format. Therefore, it violates the compliance rules outlined in the description.

ERR
